thread.title_full: Thirty Top Cloud Storage Services Named in October 2015 by bestwebdesignagencies.com

title: Thirty Top Cloud Storage Services Named in October 2015 by bestwebdesignagencies.com
text:
October 10, 2015 03:00 ET Thirty Top Cloud Storage Services Named in October 2015 by bestwebdesignagencies.com 
NAPLES, FL --(Marketwired - October 10, 2015) - The independent authority on web solutions, bestwebdesignagencies.com, has named their recommendations of the 30 best cloud storage agencies in the web development industry for the month of October 2015. Each month the independent research team at bestwebdesignagencies.com examines the best performing cloud storage agencies and ranks them based on their performance during a meticulous analysis of their provided services. The recommendations are revealed at the start of each month to assist businesses in selecting an effective solution. 
The 30 best cloud storage firms for October 2015 are: 
1) Druva 
29) SOS Online Backup 
30) iStorage 
Each month the best cloud storage agencies are put through an in-depth evaluation process in order to determine which agencies produce the best services overall. The process involves an in-depth analysis of best performing companies in areas including reliability, customer support, ease of access, ease of use, and security. Client evaluations of competing cloud storage agencies are contacted in order to obtain their unique inputs and suggestions on the agencies they have used. 
ABOUT bestwebdesignagencies.com 
bestwebdesignagencies.com is an online organizer of independent reviews and ratings. The rankings of the top mobile development services are released monthly to assist businesses in connecting with cloud storage services which feature a history of effective solutions. Thousands of mobile development services are put to the test while only the absolute best services are showcased in the rankings.
